import React from 'react'; import bg from '../assets/landing/landingbg.png'; import '../styles/Home.css'; function Home() { return (

Tales of India

With the growth of digital India, and its influence on modern nuclear families and fast paced metropolitan lives; we believe unless there isn’t a digital archive created to preserve such hidden gems, we might lead ourselves to a dying heritage.



We at Gaatha, aim to solve this problem by creating a community that serves as a forum for users to read text and picture based myths, legends and experiences that the users can share as well.



You are welcome to shop for authentic, handcrafted souvenirs from various artisans as well!

To discover a plethora of some of India’s best legends, myths and folklore head over now!

) } export default Home;
